full_summary:
=====================================

**Contract Opportunity: Metal Sheet**
----------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence invites interested suppliers to participate in the procurement of metal sheets as outlined below:

*   **Item 1:** GSIN: `N9515`, Metal Sheet, Part No. `AMS5532`, NCAGE: `81343`.  
    *   Unit of issue: each
    *   Quantity: 3
    *   Deliver to 25 CFSD Montreal, under Free Carrier conditions

**Procurement Details:**

*   **Procurement Type:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Required Documents:** Available in English and French at [canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/923cdc6ff13090cd803a5beba095df0a/w8485-237328-b_rfp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/923cdc6ff13090cd803a5beba095df0a/w8485-237328-b_rfp_eng.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/b892ec75eb8694fb39784a98621f9f1d/w8485-237328_rfp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/b892ec75eb8694fb39784a98621f9f1d/w8485-237328_rfp_fr.pdf)
*   **Language of Submission:** French or English
*   **Closing Date:** 2023-01-13T14:00:00

**Contact Information:**

*   **Name:** Ryan Duncan
*   **Email:** ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca
*   **Language of Contact:** EN- FR
*   **Department Name:** Department of National Defence

**Key Dates:**

*   **Publication Date:** 2022-12-13
*   **Closing Date:** 2023-01-13T14:00:00

Suppliers who are interested in participating in this procurement are encouraged to review the tender documents carefully and submit their offer accordingly. This tender is subject to the policies and guidelines of the Government of Canada. Please note that only candidates who provide the required documents in the English or
